Home > Restaurants > Harvest

Harvest

Australian-style Cafe $$ Main Street

Australian-style cafe with partnership with local Idle Hands Roasting Co. Locally-sourced ingredients with many gluten-free/vegan options. Perfect pre-ski location near Town Lift Plaza.

Must-Try Dishes

  • Soft Scrambled Eggs with Pesto
  • Buddha Bowl of Goodness
  • Vietnamese Banh Mi
  • Chicken Laksa Noodle Soup
  • Custom daily juice

Features & Amenities

Local Coffee Partnership Locally Sourced Ingredients Gluten Free Options Vegan Options Open Kitchen Town Lift Proximity

Perfect For

Breakfast Brunch Healthy Dining Pre Ski

Restaurant Information

Hours

Daily 8am-3pm

Contact

820 Park Ave #101, Park City, UT 84060
